sources.title: Love's Kitchen - A Dessert to Fall in Love (LOVE COMEDY with GORDON RAMSAY, comedy in German)
Love's Kitchen | Full Romantic Comedy | Sarah Sharman | Dougray Scott
sources.description:
Love's Kitchen - Rob Haley (Dougray Scott), an up-and-coming chef and restaurateur in London, is grief-stricken when he loses his wife. With encouragement from his infamous friend and real life TV Chef Gordon Ramsay, Rob decides to spice up his life by turning a run-down country pub into a gourmet restaurant. His food catches the eye - and taste buds - of beautiful American food critic Kate Templeton (Claire Forlani) and they soon both write a recipe for love that leaves both their hearts - and their stomachs - full. 
2011.  Stars: Dougray Scott, Sarah Sharman, Katrine De Candole, Gordon Ramsay
